overview: When Drea's dad gets a job interview in California, the whole family goes along for an awesome L.A. weekend. They even visit the set of a TV show hosted by Beethoven and Step by Step star Chris Castile! But the more Drea thinks about what she'd leave behind - Matt and Rebecca Long and best Friend Kimberly - the less excited she is about moving. And the thought of losing Drea reminds the Long kids of their father's death.
title: SECRET ADVENTURES: SPLIT
